R

ranking - Variable in class RankingFunction
Mapping of worlds to ranks
RankingFunction<I extends Interpretable> - Class in semantics.ranking
A ranking function provides semantics to qualitative conditionals.
RankingFunction(Interpretation<I>[]) - Constructor for class RankingFunction
Creates a new ranking function for the given set of worlds, initially mapping each world to 0.
readConditionalQuery(String) - Method in class RelationalKnowledgeBaseReader
Reads a conditional from its textual representation.
reader - Variable in class Session
Reader for a first-order knowledge base
reader - Variable in class RelationalKnowledgeBaseReader
Log4KR-Reader
readFormulaQuery(String) - Method in class RelationalKnowledgeBaseReader
Reads a single formula from its textual representation.
readKnowledgeBase(String) - Method in class RelationalKnowledgeBaseReader
Reads a knowledge base from its textual representation.
RelationalKnowledgeBase - Class in syntax
A first-order knowledge base consists of a set of conditionals and a set of closed formulas, called facts.
RelationalKnowledgeBase(Collection<RelationalConditional>, Collection<Formula<RelationalAtom>>) - Constructor for class RelationalKnowledgeBase
Creates a new first-order knowledge base with conditionals and facts.
RelationalKnowledgeBaseReader - Class in syntax
This class can read a first-order knowledge base from a textual representation and checks whether it its a restricted first-order knowledge base.
RelationalKnowledgeBaseReader() - Constructor for class RelationalKnowledgeBaseReader
 
RelationalPossibleWorld - Class in semantics.worlds
Extension of RelationalPossibleWorldMapRepresentation, adding support for quantified formulas and a different textual representation.
RelationalPossibleWorld(RelationalPossibleWorld, Collection<Constant>) - Constructor for class RelationalPossibleWorld
Creates a possible worlds based on a partially created world.
RelationalPossibleWorld(HashMap<RelationalAtom, Integer>, Collection<RelationalAtom>, Collection<Constant>) - Constructor for class RelationalPossibleWorld
Creates a possible world.
RelationalPossibleWorldFactory - Class in semantics.worlds
Extension of RelationalPossibleWorldMapRepresentationFactory, changing the creation process of possible worlds in such a way that the order of the interpretables is retained.
RelationalPossibleWorldFactory() - Constructor for class RelationalPossibleWorldFactory
 
RelationalRankingFunction - Class in semantics.ranking
A relational ranking function extends the idea of a ranking function to the first-order case.
RelationalRankingFunction(Interpretation<RelationalAtom>[], Collection<Constant>) - Constructor for class RelationalRankingFunction
Creates a relational ranking function, initially ranking each world with rank 0.
RelationalSystemZ - Class in semantics.ranking
Implementation of a system z-like approach to create a ranking function for a first-order conditional knowledge base.
RelationalSystemZ(Collection<Constant>, RelationalKnowledgeBase, TolerancePair, RelationalPossibleWorld[]) - Constructor for class RelationalSystemZ
Creates an instance of System Z that checks the pair and, if valid, computes the ranking function.
RelationalSystemZ(Collection<Constant>, RelationalKnowledgeBase, TolerancePair) - Constructor for class RelationalSystemZ
Creates an instance of System Z that checks the pair and, if valid, computes the ranking function.
relSystemZ - Variable in class Session
First-order system Z
